definition: to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: Using the knowledge of abstract algebra, the rotation groups of the regular polyhedron are determined.
sentences.chinese: 通過抽象代數知識，求出所有正多面體的旋轉羣。

sentences.english: The students in a topology course should have some knowledge of mathematical analysis and abstract algebra .
sentences.chinese: 拓撲學要求學生具備一些數學分析和抽象代數的基礎。
